LongDescription: <b><i>SIGNAL MAINTENANCE</i></font><br clear=left>[F] Jamaica-bound trains skip 75 Av, Briarwood and Sutphin Blvd</b>Weekend, 9:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Jan 12 - 15<br><br>For service <i>to</i> <b>75 Av</b>, take the [F] to Union Tpke and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [E] or [F].<br><br>For service <i>to </i><b>Briarwood</b> and <b>Sutphin Blvd</b>, take the [F]<b> </b>to Parsons Blvd and transfer to a<br>Coney Island-bound [F].<br><br>For service <i>from </i><b>75 Av</b> and <b>Briarwood</b>, take the [E] or [F] to Union Tpke or 71 Av and<br>transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].<br><br>For service <i>from </i><b>Sutphin Blvd</b>, take the [F] to Union Tpke and transfer to a Jamaica-bound [F].<br><b><br>

LongDescription: <b><i>TRACK REPLACEMENT</i><br clear=left>[M] No trains between Essex St and Broadway Junction<br clear=left>[J] Trains provide alternate service</b>Weekends, 6:15 AM to 11:45 PM, Saturday, Jan 13, 20, 27 <i>and </i>Feb 3<br>                   8 AM to 10 PM, Sunday, Jan 14, 21, 28 <i>and</i> Feb 4<br><br>No [M] service at <b>Broadway Junction</b>, <b>Halsey St</b>, <b>Gates Av</b>, <b>Kosciuszko St</b>, <b>Myrtle Av</b>, <b>Flushing Av</b>,<br><b>Lorimer St</b>, <b>Hewes St</b>, <b>Marcy Av</b> and <b>Essex St</b>.<br><br>For service <i>to/from</i> these stations take the [J]* instead.<br><br><i>*Please review [J] advisories for additional information that may affect your trip.<br><br></i><b>Reminder:</b> [M] Shuttle train operates <i>all times</i> between <b>Metropolitan Av</b> and <b>Myrtle-Wyckoff Avs<br></b>and [SB] free shuttle buses operate between <b>Myrtle-Wyckoff Av</b> and <b>Myrtle Av</b>.<br><b><br>

LongDescription: <b><i>ELECTRICAL IMPROVEMENTS</i><br clear=left>[R] Bay Ridge-bound trains run express from Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr to 59 St, Brooklyn</b>Weekend, 9:45 PM Fri to 5 AM Mon, Jan 12 - 15<br><br>Trains stop at 36 St.<br><br>For service <i>to</i> Union St, 4 Av-9 St, Prospect Av and 25 St, take the [R] to 36 St and transfer to a <br>Manhattan-bound [F]* <i>local</i>, [N]* or [R].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [F] [N] or [R] to Atlantic Av-Barclays Ctr and transfer <br>to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><br>For service <i>to</i> 45 St and 53 St, take the [R] to 59 St and transfer to a Manhattan-bound [N] or [R].<br><br>For service <i>from</i> these stations, take the [N] or [R] to 36 St and transfer to a Bay Ridge-bound [R].<br><br><i>*This detour has taken into account additional planned service changes.<br></i><b><br>
